mapper.update: UPDATE PERSON SET USERNAME = #{username}, FIRSTNAME = #{firstName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTNAME = #{lastName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGANIZATION = #{organization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONENUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE ID = #{id}
UPDATE PERSON SET LOGGED_IN = TRUE, LAST_LOGIN = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{value}
